Articles.Content:
![HO3aPg5.png](http://i.imgur.com/HO3aPg5.png)

Welcome to Hunter Ariel Industries. We make many planes. We have two categories of planes, real and not real. The 'real' ones are things like modern or WW2 aircraft, such as the Eurofighter Typhoon and the Me 262. The other crafts we build fit in the 'not real' category are things like mini jets that go 1800 m/s, or fighter bombers that carry 3,700 kg of bombs, with one engine. If you like the sound of this, have a look at our vehicles. We hope you use our vehicles.

  **MOD LIST**  

[Kerbal Aircraft Expansion](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76668-0-90-Kerbal-Aircraft-Expansion-%28KAX%29-v2-3-4)

[SXT (USE MINI PACK FOR AIRBRAKES)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79542-90-SXT-Lack-s-Stock-Extension-N-1-and-Aero-update-SXT-20-15FEV15-KSC-v3)

[BD Armoury](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-0-25-BDArmory-v0-7-1-1-Dev-Thread-Dec-9)

[Mk4 System](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/380/Mark%20IV%20Spaceplane%20System)

[BD Adjusible Gear](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99660-0-25-Adjustable-Landing-Gear-v1-0-4%28doors-fixed%29-Nov-14)

I will be posting ships in the area below!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-25T04:30:19Z" title="02/25/2015 04:30  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 25, 2015</time> by dec159**
It's best if you start off with some pirctures to get people interested.

**Messerschmitt Me 262**  

![ZYu2pOB.png](http://i.imgur.com/ZYu2pOB.png)

![5q5sjXc.png](http://i.imgur.com/5q5sjXc.png)

![qp8PI36.png](http://i.imgur.com/qp8PI36.png)

Instructions:

The aircraft stalls at 100 m/s and loses all control.

Make sure that you keep at least 1/3 thrust on at all times.

EVEN WHEN LANDING

Cut the engines when just above the runway for a smooth landing. 

[DOWNLOAD](https://www.dropbox.com/s/pp9tmsmgzcr99qs/Messerschmitt%20Me%20262.craft?dl=0)

Have fun guys, more to come!

- - - Updated - - -

Heh, cool, I just started playing War Thunder too ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif).
Thanks! I hope you enjoy flying these. There will be more soon.

**Hawker Tempest (Mk. V)**  

![XnHSeem.png](http://i.imgur.com/XnHSeem.png)

![4mJAsJe.png](http://i.imgur.com/4mJAsJe.png)

[DOWNLOAD](https://www.dropbox.com/s/0raxryb0f7ltccp/Hawker%20Tempest.craft?dl=0)

 **FLYING THE TEMPEST** 

The tempests landing gear are not high enough, you need to land with your nose slightly up, and never flatten out on takeoff. Be careful on the brakes too.

> 
> ![nD1jkjg.png](http://i.imgur.com/nD1jkjg.png)
> 
> ![wgwCVtw.png](http://i.imgur.com/wgwCVtw.png)
> 
> 

Have fun flying, more to come!
for the Tempest, have you looked at Bahamuto's gear pack (sorry, forgot the exact name of it)
They don't really work on the Tempest, they are shaped so a part will stick out of the top of the wing. Thanks anyway, definitely gonna use them at some point.

**Gloster Meteor**  

![K1iU4Vt.png](http://i.imgur.com/K1iU4Vt.png)

[DOWNLOAD](https://www.dropbox.com/s/74uzyjwy4o0q7sb/Gloster%20Meteor.craft?dl=0)

This plane is really low, so it looks more like real life, which means to land it you need to flatten out and drop the last few metres. It turns great though.

> 
> ![GVvcLTS.png](http://i.imgur.com/GVvcLTS.png)

The gear on the buffalo are not quite correct, the buffalo had really strange gear. Both of these planes require the BD gear mod.

Have fun flying, more to come!

**De Havilland Vampire**  

![GZaNPIc.png](http://i.imgur.com/GZaNPIc.png)

[DOWNLOAD](https://www.dropbox.com/s/28218yl5gjjkk8k/De%20Havilland%20Vampire.craft?dl=0)

> 
>  
> 
> ![JyRtFDE.png](http://i.imgur.com/JyRtFDE.png)
> 
> ![hVQQZgn.png](http://i.imgur.com/hVQQZgn.png)
> 
> ![iYFxIMC.png](http://i.imgur.com/iYFxIMC.png)

This thing turns on a dime. It is crazy.

DO NOT barrel roll (Roll and Pitch) because it will murder you.

Hope you enjoy, more to come!
